summary: This bill, the Protecting American Families and Servicemembers from Anthrax Act, mandates the development of a 10-year strategy for ensuring a sustained stockpile of anthrax countermeasures. It directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services and the Secretary of Defense to collaborate and report to Congress on the anthrax threat, existing federal programs, and initiatives to protect military dependents. The bill defines key terms like "anthrax countermeasure" and "appropriate congressional committees.
